Khazix.name: Kha'Zixº
Khazix.title: ºøthe Voidreaverº
Khazix.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºA vicious Void predator, Kha'Zix infiltrated Valoran to devour the land's most promising creatures. With each kill he absorbs his prey's strength, evolving to grow more powerful. Kha'Zix hungers most to conquer and consume Rengar, the one beast he considers his equal.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen Kha'Zix crossed over into this world, he was fragile and ravenous. The animals he first encountered were too small to fuel the rapid evolution he craved. Kha'Zix focused his hunger on the most dangerous creatures he could find, risking his life to satisfy his need. With each kill he feasted and changed, becoming a stronger, faster predator. Kha'Zix soon chased his prey with unrestrained aggression, believing he was unstoppable. One day, while savoring a fresh kill, the predator became the prey. From cover a creature pounced in a blur of fangs and steel, tackling him to the ground. It roared in his face slashing and clawing, and Kha'Zix felt his blood spill for the first time. Screeching in fury, he sliced at the brute's eye driving it back. They fought from sunset to sunrise. Finally, near death, they reluctantly separated. As his wounds closed, Kha'Zix burned with anticipation at the idea of devouring one who could match the Void's strength. He resumed his search for powerful prey with renewed vigor. Someday, Kha'Zix will feast on Rengar.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºø''Kill. Consume. Adapt.''ºøº
º-- Kha'Zixº
Khazix.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºA vicious Void predator, Kha'Zix infiltrated Valoran to devour the land's most promising creatures. With each kill he absorbs his prey's strength, evolving to grow more powerful. Kha'Zix hungers most to conquer and consume ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøEnemies are considered isolated if they have no allies within a short distance. The damage of Taste Their Fear is massively increased against these targets.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøUnseen Threat activates when Kha'zix cannot be seen by the enemy team. Reactivate by using brush or Void Assault. Don't forget to apply Unseen Threat by autoattacking enemy champions.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºKha'Zix has a great deal of freedom to choose where and when to fight. Pick your battles carefully to succeed.ºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTaste Their Fear deals bonus damage to targets that are isolated.  Gain an advantage by fighting near allied minions, champions, or turrets.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøLeap and Void Assault have long cooldowns. Kha'Zix is very vulnerable when these are not available.øºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøTaste Their Fearº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKha'Zix passively marks enemies that are isolated from nearby allies. Taste Their Fear deals physical damage to a single target. Damage increased on isolated targets. If he chooses to ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº<font color='#00DD33'>ºøEvolve Enlarged Clawsøº</font>ºøºøºøºøºøºøº, this deals bonus damage against low health targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ººøºøºMarks enemies who are isolated from nearby allies.ºøºøº

ºActive: ºDeals º{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøº physical damage. If the target is isolated, the damage is increased by ºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}%.

ºøEvolved Enlarged Claws: ºøººøºøDeals bonus physical damage equal to ºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºøº% of the target's missing Health (can be increased by isolation, max ºøºøºøº{{ e4 }}ºøºøºøºø vs. monsters). Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by ºøºøºøºøº{{ e5 }}.

spells.name: ºVoid Spikeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKha'Zix fires exploding spikes that slow and deal physical damage to all nearby enemies. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº<font color='#00DD33'>ºøEvolve Spike Racksøº</font>ºøºø, Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone.øºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºFires exploding spikes, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø physical damage to all nearby enemies and slowing them for øºøºøº{{ e3 }}% for º{{ e4 }}ºøº seconds. Heals Kha'Zix for ºøº{{ e2 }} (+º{{ a2 }})ºøºø if he is within the explosion radius.øºøº

ºøEvolved Spike Racks: øººøºøVoid Spike fires three spikes in a cone.øºøº

spells.name: Leapº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøKha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to øºøºøºøº<font color='#00DD33'>ºEvolve Wingsº</font>ºøºøºøºøºø, Leap's range increases dramatically. Also, on champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºLeaps to a target area, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø physical damage.º

ºøEvolved Wings:ººøºøºøºø Increases Leap's range. On champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºVoid Assaultº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøEach rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Void Assault stealths Kha'Zix, triggers Unseen Threat, and increases Movement Speed. If he chooses to ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº<font color='#00DD33'>ºøEvolve Active Camouflageºøº</font>ºøºøºøºøº, Void Assault can be cast three times and Kha'Zix takes reduced damage while in stealth.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ººøºøºøºRanking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.ºøºøºøº

ºActive: ººøStealths for º{{ e1 }}ºøºøºøºø second. Activates Unseen Threat and increases Kha'Zix's Movement Speed by ºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøº%. Void Assault can be cast a second time within ºøºøº{{ e2 }}º seconds.º

ºøEvolved Active Camouflage: ºøººøºøºVoid Assault can be cast three times. Kha'Zix takes ºøºøº{{ e4 }}ºøºø% reduced damage while in stealth.ºøº

passive.name: ºøUnseen Threatº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøWhen Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
